document_data.caption: Stagwick on a map of Hartsvale.
document_data.name: Stagwick
document_data.mainbody: '''Stagwick''' was a village in [[Hartsvale]], notable for being the home of [[Tavis Burdun]].
document_data.Description: Stagwick was a small settlement with narrow streets and huts.
document_data.Geography: The village was the eastern connection of [[Coggin's Rise]], which ran west to the [[Clear Whirl River]] and [[Hartwick]].
document_data.Government: Stagwick was led by the Dobbin family.

Notable Locations.[[Dobbin Manor]]: The estate of the Dobbins of Stagwick.
Notable Locations.The [[Weary Giant|Weary Giant Inn]]: The only inn in the village, this also served as an orphanage.

document_data.Notable Inhabitants:
* [[Avner]] of Hartwick, an orphan living at the Weary Giant.
* Tavis Burdun, the [[firbolg]] [[ranger]] who ran the Weary Giant Inn.
* Lord Mayor, Earl [[Ruther Dobbin]], one of Princess [[Brianna Burdun|Brianna's]] suitors in [[1369 DR]].
document_data.History:
As of [[1366 DR]], the Dobbin family had ruled Stagwick for 35 generations, as detailed in the book ''[[A Full History of the Dobbins of Stagwick]]''.

On the day that Princess Brianna was abducted by [[Ice Spire ogre]]s, she had been attending a [[fire giant]] dance performance at the Weary Giant in the village.
